name: oraimo Slice Link 10000mAh 3 Built-in Charging Cables AniFast 12W Fast Charge Slim and Portable 4 Outputs Power Bank
short_detail:
✔12W Fast Charging
✔4 Outputs 
✔Slim and Portable 
✔Widely Compatible
✔3 Built-in Charging Cables
*With Lightning, Type-C & Micro-USB Cable
long_detail:
Product Parameters:

Capacity: 10000mAh (37Wh)
Input 1 Micro-USB: 5V 2A
Input 2 Type-C: 5V 2A
Output USB-A: 5V 2.4A(Max)
Output Micro-USB Cable/Type-C Cable: 5V 2.1A
Output Lightning Cable: 5V 2.4A
Total Output: 5V 2.4A (Max)

Model: OPB-P5101

 

Product Features:

3 Built-in Charging Cables and 4 Outputs
Enjoy High-speed Charging Anytime

Total 4 output ports (3 cables and one USB-A port), supporting fast charging for 4 intelligent devices simultaneously, saving your time and no more having to carry a separate cable.

*3 Built-in Charging Cables: Lightning,Type-C&Micro-USB Cable

 

12W Fast Charging
Designed for Speed

USB-A and lightning ports offers faster charging for almost any device. Supports up to 2.4A fast charging.

 

Dual Recharging Modes
More Options for Recharge

It comes with Type-C and Micro-USB two recharging ports, you could choose the way to recharge.

 

10000mAh Capacity
Powerful and Portable

Store a high capacity of 10,000mAh to charge all of your devices, help you stay connected during a power outage.

 

Universal Compatibility
Compatible with 1,000+ Devices

With multiple output ports and various charging cables included, our power bank can provide a reliable and efficient charging solution.

 

Durable Design
Built to Last

Rugged and Durable
Built-in Charging Cable
Thickened wire protection and anti-winding process make it more durable.

Built-in Smart-charging Chip
Intelligently identifies the fast-charging protocol of your mobile to deliver the speediest possible charge.

High-quality Wire
Pure copper conductor, higher charging conversion rate, less charging conversion loss.

 

Multi-protection System
Premium Safety Features

The premium Lithium polymer chip is not just safe, also has a higher conversion rate, stable voltage and reliable circuit protection.
